timeline.bodyText: I wouldn't prefix with 'qe-' to make this shorter - the data-ouia prefix of attribute says it all - for use during testing.
timeline.author: jstastny-cz

replies.bodyText:
@jstastny-cz yes, I was not sure if to prefix or not. In final I decided to prefix as in past similar initiative using 'qe-' prefix was done. However that time 'class' attribute was used.
I agree with you this time attribute name explains the purpose and the 'qe-' prefix is not needed anymore.
replies.author: jomarko

timeline.bodyText: Is it ok to return "dmn-graph-navigator-expression" if getItem() == null?
timeline.author: caponetto

replies.bodyText: @caponetto good point, thank you, I agree this way is not ideal and could confuse other developers. I tried to rewrite this logic to make more understandable. Please re-review once I push the changes.
replies.author: jomarko

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't this init call be in a setup method or something like this? It seems weird to me an init inside setText.
timeline.author: caponetto

replies.bodyText: @caponetto good point, I will move this initOuiaComponentAttributes() into constructor; However still on this line I will need to update ouiaComponentId because it depends on the text. Please rereview once I push the changes. Thank you.
replies.author: jomarko

timeline.bodyText:
Isn't the responsibility of the item calling its own initOuiaComponentAttributes internally?
At least, this is what I have been observing on the other ouia components.
timeline.author: caponetto

replies.bodyText: true, will try to move it directly into TreeItem, thank you
replies.author: jomarko
